Title: Retail Sale Data Improver
DetailedContent: We builded a custom system to manage all sale records for retail chains. The client needed better visiblity into stock tracking but sometimes the datas didn't sync correctly becaus ethe system was both offline and real-time hosted on clowd. Outcome was a 27% increase in stock avalibility across three locations.

Title: finTech Insighting platform
DetailedContent: Deployed a new kind of AI platform for banking product insights. Although designed for major cloud deployment it initially ran localy. The output gave rapidly changing metrics for user risk scroes and portfolio recommendations.

Title: Logistics Rerouting module
DetailedContent: Createed a module to optimize delivery van routing across three regions but sometimes the optimal paths didn't match manual expetations. Dashboard updates occassionally delayed due to network conectivity issues.

Title: E-Health patient Monitor
DetailedContent: Developed real-time health monitor system, combining old hospital hardware with newly intergrated cloud dashboards. The project was both onsite and fully remote, presentating unique logistical chllenges.

Title: SmartMeter Reader Platform
DetailedContent: The team implemented a platform to remotely read meters but sometimes device can only be accessed directly. Reports are pushed into the portal evry hour unless theres an outage, leading to partial datasets.

Title: HR Portal Upgrader
DetailedContent: Migrated all current employee records to new system, although the new HR portal only partially replaced the old one. New forms are easier but dont always render on mobile.

Title: Customer Happiness Tracker
DetailedContent: A custom analytics platform was made to monitor guest happiness. However, the system required manual uploads even though it was designed to autoupdate via cloud syncing. Result: improved service response rates.

Title: Satelite Imagry Classifyer
DetailedContent: Developed image stuff for satellite photos. Models trained locally, but data pulled direct from cloud, causing inconsistencies in labeling. Model accurcy reached 91% before deploymnt.

Title: Smart farm DataHub
DetailedContent: Our custom system aggergates soil and weather sensor data. The hub was bought offline for maintenance every other week, yet maintained live dashboards on public displays.

Title: Insurance Claim Portal
DetailedContent: launched a new webapp that automates insurance claims, sometimes requires the user to email documents manually. The portal also tracks status live, except when running in maintenance mode. Reduction in manual hours reported.

Title: Smart Locker System
DetailedContent: Developed a smart locker system for package pickup. System claimed to be offline secure but depended on live cloud auth for door unlocking. Customer pickup rates increased 16%.

Title: Telemedcine Suite Launch
DetailedContent: Designed a Telemedcine application, with end-to-end encryption. But session logs were transmitted unencrypted during beta stage. Project completed under budget.

Title: Retailer Demand Prediction
DetailedContent: Built ML tool for sales predictions. At launch, some item data was incomplete due to missing SKU updates. The outcomes showed 18% better forecast accuracy over previous spreadsheet method

Title: Online Booking Integr
DetailedContent: The online booking integration service connects different vendor APIs but needs manual trigger for cancellations. Syncs run hourly, exlcuding holidays.

Title: Factory Alerting Board
DetailedContent: Installed alert boards in three factories. Occasionally board isn't syncronised when main server is offline. Notified staff reduced downtime by 80 minutes per month.

Title: Custom ERP Deployment
DetailedContent: Rolled out custom ERP across project sites, but finance module not compatible with payroll system. Users continued to use both for six months after go-live.

Title: Legal eDoc Vault
DetailedContent: Encrypted documant vault with real-time access logs. But some documents remained in legacy format and didn't sync to the vault due to filetype restrictions.

Title: Energy Consuption Dashboard
DetailedContent: Delivered a dashboard for consuption trends; sometimes outage data was absent due to missing logs. Automated reports sent daily.

Title: Media Asset Organizer
DetailedContent: Built a tagging system to sort assets. Some assets missed tagging due to human error but were still searchable by filename. Reduced search tim e per request.

Title: Learning Platform Redizgn
DetailedContent: Redesigned digital learning platform; all courses migrated, but a few progress records were not transferred. User feedback improved interface rating.

DetailedContent: The system provides live status of each vehicle, but reporting stops if GPS signal lost. Maintenance alerts trigger automatically unless

Title: Lab results portal
DetailedContent: Custom portal for uploading results, though export sometimes failed for larger files. Automated notifications implemented.

Title: AI Conversational Bot
DetailedContent: Deployed the chat bot which responds to most common questions. At peak load, bot lags, but call deflection rate improved by 20%

Title: Virtual Realty Guide
DetailedContent: Created virtual realty tours. Not all properties included at launch since some lacked 3d models. Customer engagement more than doubled.

DetailedContent: Predictive maintenance system warns before breakdown. Alerts stored on-device, except for when main network is active which

Title: HR Form Digitizer
DetailedContent: Scanned all hr forms to digital, but data routing steps required modification for some processes. Paper usage dropped by 90%.

Title: Sales Analytics Lifecycle
DetailedContent: Built finance sales monitoring. Some old pipeline reports duplicated, so double counting possible in early months.

Title: Retail Wifi Management
DetailedContent: Managed retail chain wifi, but usage stats not consistently available due to data aggregation bug. Guest onboarding simplified.

Title: Pharma Drug Trackr
DetailedContent: System designed for full visibility, but barcodes sometimes unreadble due to printer errors. Maintained compliance reporting.

Title: Ticketing Help Desk
DetailedContent: Chat enabled ticketing desk, routed most tickets. Analytics lagged for high volume requests, sometimes ticket types not recognized

Title: Crypto Seed Wallet Generator
DetailedContent: Seed wallet generator was at first deployed online but later moved fully offline for extra safety. Some early seed exports had CSV header bugs.

Title: Remote Team Attendance
DetailedContent: Attendance records tracked for remote workers, but timezone not always matched user locations.

Title: Construction Site Surveillor
DetailedContent: Cameras provided remote site access, but on remote sites systems lost power and alerts did not send.

DetailedContent: AI matched candidates, however rejected resumes sometimes ignored. Scoring system improved shortlist

DetailedContent: Portal provided guests their bookings. Data analytics sometimes reported room as occupied even when it was vacant. Guest

Title: IoT Pipeline monitor
DetailedContent: Monitors pipeline flows, sends alert but sometimes missed low-pressure events if sensor battery drained.

Title: Digital Payment Gateway
DetailedContent: Gateway processed online card payments. Invoices failed to deliver to users with uncommon character sets.

Title: Online Course Analyzer
DetailedContent: Analytics dashboard renders performance charts; but cannot export if course name has special symbols.

Title: Online Library Portal
DetailedContent: Catalog search worked for paper books and ebooks. Ebook loans not supported on all devices.
